page.title: 14HISTORY-BECKHAM PALACE
page.content: PERHAPS THE MOST INTRIGUING BUILDING WE SAW WAS "GRESHAM" OR {BECKHAM PALACE,}NOW OWNED BY A LONDON GENTLEMAN WHO BOUGHT IT OFF A SHERINGHAM SOLICITOR. IT IS NOW DERELICT AND DANGEROUS. HALF HAS BEEN DEMOLISHED. IT WAS ORIGINALLY A WORKHOUSE WHICH HOUSED BOTH ADULTS AND CHILDERN. DURING{WW2}THE AMERICANS WERE BILLETED THERE AND MADE A FEW CRUDE ALTERATIONS. IT BECAME AN AMERICAN HOSPITAL RUN BY GERMAN MATRONS. THERE WAS A LAUNDRY AND A NICE CHAPEL WITH STAINED GLASS WINDOWS ON ENTERING ONE SAW A HALL WITH 2 CIRCULAR STAIRCASES. THERE WAS A DOME. IT IS NOW A WASTELAND. IT WAS BUILT IN {1851}. {BY A.STEVENS { & { G.TOONE
